pullRequest.title: Add doc-values aggregator for the count(v) aggregation.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Summary of the changes / Why this improves CrateDB
It improves the performance of the global standard deviation aggregations.
See #10048 for more information
Without doc-values aggregators:
## Running Query:
   Name: global count on long
   Statement:
     select count(duration) from uservisits
   Concurrency: 1
   Iterations: 5000
100%| 5000/5000 [04:14<00:00, 19.67 requests/s]
Runtime (in ms):
    mean:    49.637 ± 0.540
    min/max: 34.369 → 309.033
Percentile:
    50:   43.957 ± 19.476 (stdev)
    95:   77.465
    99.9: 218.348

## Running Query:
   Name: global count on float
   Statement:
     select count("adRevenue") from uservisits
   Concurrency: 1
   Iterations: 5000
100%| 5000/5000 [04:16<00:00, 19.50 requests/s]
Runtime (in ms):
    mean:    50.090 ± 0.353
    min/max: 41.570 → 225.817
Percentile:
    50:   46.911 ± 12.746 (stdev)
    95:   66.626
    99.9: 219.086
# Running tearDown

With doc-values aggregators:
# Running setUp
# Running benchmark

## Running Query:
   Name: global count on long
   Statement:
     select count(duration) from uservisits
   Concurrency: 1
   Iterations: 5000
100%| 5000/5000 [01:19<00:00, 62.67 requests/s]
Runtime (in ms):
    mean:    14.641 ± 1.044
    min/max: 7.877 → 1172.763
Percentile:
    50:   11.914 ± 37.657 (stdev)
    95:   23.165
    99.9: 226.907

## Running Query:
   Name: global count on float
   Statement:
     select count("adRevenue") from uservisits
   Concurrency: 1
   Iterations: 5000
100%| 5000/5000 [01:10<00:00, 71.00 requests/s]
Runtime (in ms):
    mean:    12.104 ± 0.206
    min/max: 7.777 → 179.364
Percentile:
    50:   10.606 ± 7.430 (stdev)
    95:   19.244
    99.9: 75.315
# Running tearDown

Checklist

 Added an entry in CHANGES.txt for user facing changes
 Updated documentation & sql_features table for user facing changes
 Touched code is covered by tests
 CLA is signed
 This does not contain breaking changes, or if it does:

It is released within a major release
It is recorded in CHANGES.txt
It was marked as deprecated in an earlier release if possible
You've thought about the consequences and other components are adapted
(E.g. AdminUI)

nodes.bodyText: Could we also optimize the string type case?

beforeCommit.message:
Add doc-values aggregator for the count(v) aggregation.

It improves the performance of the global standard deviation aggregations.
See https://github.com/crate/crate/pull/10048 for more information
